127.text:
Well, we think you should,

130.text:
When ghosts and moonlighters cheat HMRC, the
people they're really cheating are you.

135.text:
The money they should have paid in taxes would
have been used by the government

139.text:
to build schools and colleges; to pay your
teachers' salaries;

141.text: to save and improve people's lives through the health service;

145.text: to fight crime and defend our country.

hidden economy have decided they should spend

153.text:

And they hold on to more than £5 billion

158.text:

in taxes to help everyone.

162.text:
Leaving the rest of us to pay more for the
vital services we all rely on

166.text: for our health, education, safety and security.

171.text:
Not paying taxes can also give dishonest people
an unfair advantage,

175.text:
because the person who's cheating by not
paying tax

178.text:

services they sell.

182.text:
And this means that in undercutting prices,
they take customers away from honest businesses.

187.text:
And we're sure you'll agree, that's
just not fair.

191.text: This is why the hidden economy is a real problem.
